EmailTemplate.name: Past Event in Set Status Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Update the Meeting Status for your event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
Your event "{!Event.Subject}" related to https://livongohealth2ndorg.lightning.force.com/{!Event.What} has ended. Please update the Meeting Status to reflect if the event Ran or Cancelled.
If the event has been rescheduled, please update the Start Date.
Thank you,
Livongo Salesforce Team
